page.title: 19Bank House,a Mystery.
page.content: On a map we found a big house named Bank House. We set of from school at Shuttlewood to find it. First we crossed the recreation ground then we passed Bentinck, Lodge Farm, went under the motorway bridge and over the Mineral railway. When we finally got to Bank House we could not find the path we wanted, whichever way we went we could not get through and had to turn back. In all we walked over 8 Kilometres when it was only 4 Kilometres according to the map to get where we wanted. When we finally got to Bank House it was in ruins except for one part. When we rang the bell a dog barked but no one answered even though the place looked lived in. Judging by the large stables this was once a rich persons house. By HELEN LUKE & OTHERS.
